mapper.select: select c.`id` as communityId,c.`community_name` as communityName, c.`avatar` as communityAvatar,c.`follower_count` as followerCount,c.`posts_count` as postsCount from community c where c.id=#{communityId}

select c.`id` as communityId,c.`community_name` as communityName,c.`avatar` as communityAvatar,c.`follower_count` as followerCount,c.`posts_count` as postsCount from users u,community c where u.id=#{userId} and JSON_CONTAINS(u.follow_community, CONVERT(c.id,CHAR)) = 1 order by communityId asc
